metadata.title: CVE-2023-25514 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability incuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds read by tricking auser into running cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploitof this vulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, codeexecution, and limited information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
